title: [Large-scale] Analysis of Trends in Distance and Open Education and Online Learning Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental concepts of distance education and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Case-based learning focused on applying language education to working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain three or more key research trends (2009-2016) in the field of distance education
Learners can apply five new instructional approaches to practical settings when designing online learning experiences
Analyze cases of MOOCs and OER utilization to propose integration strategies for language education curricula
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
